name: Replinauts
description:
Check your systems and launch Probes to research asteroids then rocket Replinauts to mine the resources. Replinauts will replicate and move to as many new astroid homes as the resources allow. Replinauts was created in 48 hours at the Indie Galactic Game Jam 2016.

Just run the game and mess around. Trial and error will make you a Asteroid mining mogul.

Use Arrow keys to zoom in/out and rotate the view of the asteroid belt.

Click an Asteroid and hit LAUNCH! Choose either a Probe or a Replinaut to launch.

See if you can mine the entire belt before running out of funds.

Replinauts was created in 48 hours at the Indie Galactic Game Jam.
